about_the_game:
Soundtrack of Fantastic Creatures

The soundtrack includes:

01 Genesis.mp3 - 03:46
02 Source of Evil.mp3 - 02:44
03 Black Tortoise of the North.mp3 - 02:48
04 Pillar of Heaven.mp3 - 02:33
05 Empress Nuwa.mp3 - 03:09
06 Base of Fire.mp3 - 04:39
07 Azure Dragon of the East.mp3 - 03:20
08 Fantastic Creatures.mp3 - 02:04
09 Primordial Chaos.mp3 - 01:47
10 Song of the People.mp3 - 04:00
11 Vermillion Bird of the South.mp3 03:06
12 Dance of the Yellow River.mp3 - 04:27
13 Distant Memory.mp3 - 00:50
14 Hammer and Anvil.mp3 - 03:04
15 Mend the Heavens.mp3 - 03:59
16 White Tiger of the West.mp3 - 03:18
17 Harmony or Destruction.mp3 - 03:29
18 Queen Mother of the West.mp3 - 02:26
19 Sukhavati.mp3 - 05:10

Music composed by Ian Chen

Musicians
Erhu: : 梁雲河
Pipa and Guzheng: 馬梅椰
Cello: Armen Ksajikian
Dizi and Sheng: 樹志明
